author: Dan Cancian
title: Donald Trump Says Sports Will Return as 'Made for TV' Under New Guidelines, with Games Played Behind Closed Doors
description: The President said fans will only be allowed into stadiums and arenas gradually once the virus is completely eradicated.
content:
The major U.S. sports leagues will resume behind closed doors, with fans barred from stadiums and arenas until the country has overcome the coronavirus pandemic, President Donald Trump said on Thursday.
The NBA, NHL, and MLS have been suspended for over a mo… [+3496 chars]
